1.name: King Kong
1.description: A film crew goes to a tropical island for an exotic location shoot and discovers a colossal ape who takes a shine to their female blonde star. He is then captured and brought back to New York City for public exhibition.

2.name: The Invisible Man
2.description: A scientist finds a way of becoming invisible, but in doing so, he becomes murderously insane.

3.name: Rafter Romance
3.description: A man and a woman share an apartment on a shift basis, never seeing each other; she dislikes him until they actually meet.

4.name: Duck Soup
4.description: Rufus T. Firefly is named president/dictator of bankrupt Freedonia and declares war on neighboring Sylvania over the love of wealthy Mrs. Teasdale.

5.name: Employees' Entrance
5.description: A working girl is menaced by her tyrannical employer.

6.name: Ever in My Heart
6.description: World War I brings tribulations to an American woman married to a German.

7.name: One Sunday Afternoon
7.description: Middle-aged dentist Biff Grimes reminisces about his unrequited love for beautiful Virginia Brush and her husband Hugo, his ex-friend, who betrayed him.

8.name: Morning Glory
8.description: When a naively innocent, aspiring actress arrives on the Broadway scene, she is taken under the wing of several theater veterans who mentor her to ultimate success.

9.name: Ex-Lady
9.description: Although free spirit Helen Bauer does not believe in marriage, she consents to marry Don, but his infidelities cause her to also take on a lover.

10.name: Ekstase
10.description: Eva has just gotten married to an older gentleman, but discovers that he is obsessed with order in his life and doesn't have much room for passion. She becomes despondent and leaves him, ...                See full summary »

11.name: Lilly Turner
11.description: A carnival magician deserts his wife when he finds out she's pregnant. She then marries the carnival's barker, but finds herself attracted to a young engineer.

12.name: The Barbarian
12.description: An American tourist catches the eye of a disguised Arab prince who decides to kidnap her, then try to win her love.

13.name: Bed of Roses
13.description: Lorry and Minnie are ex-hookers who leave prison, determined to find the good life with rich men. Along the way Lorry meets and falls in love with cotton barge owner Dan. She must choose ...                See full summary »

14.name: 42nd Street
14.description: A director puts on what may be his last Broadway show and, at the last moment, a naive newcomer has to replace the star.

15.name: Little Women
15.description: A chronicle of the lives of a group of sisters growing up in nineteenth-century America.

16.name: Gold Diggers of 1933
16.description: A wealthy composer rescues unemployed Broadway performers with a new play.

17.name: Mystery of the Wax Museum
17.description: The disappearance of people and corpses leads a reporter to a wax museum and a sinister sculptor.

18.name: Baby Face
18.description: A young woman, sexually exploited all her life, decides to turn the tables and exploit the hapless men at a big city bank - by gleefully sleeping her way to the top.

19.name: The Story of Temple Drake
19.description: A wealthy but neurotic Southern belle finds herself trapped in the hideout of a gang of vicious bootleggers. The gang's leader lusts after her, and is determined not to let anything stand in the way of his having her.

20.name: Sons of the Desert
20.description: When Stan and Ollie trick their wives into thinking that they are taking a medicinal cruise while they're actually going to a convention, the wives find out the truth the hard way.

21.name: Only Yesterday
21.description: A one-night fling during World War I results in a young girl getting pregnant. Years later, she meets him again. Now a successful businessman, he doesn't even remember her, but tries to seduce her.

22.name: Footlight Parade
22.description: Chester Kent struggles against time, romance, and a rival's spy to produce spectacular live "prologues" for movie houses.

23.name: Das Testament des Dr. Mabuse
23.description: A new crime wave grips the city and all clues seem to lead to the nefarious Dr. Mabuse, even though he has been imprisoned in a mental asylum for nearly a decade.

24.name: Queen Christina
24.description: Queen Christina of Sweden is a popular monarch who is loyal to her country. However, when she falls in love with a Spanish envoy, she must choose between the throne and the man she loves.

25.name: Alice in Wonderland
25.description: In Victorian England a bored young girl dreams that she has entered a fantasy world called Wonderland populated by even more fantastic characters.

26.name: She Done Him Wrong
26.description: In the Gay Nineties, a seductive nightclub singer contends with several suitors, including a jealous escaped convict and a handsome temperance league member.

27.name: The Private Life of Henry VIII.
27.description: King Henry VIII marries five more times after his divorce from his first wife Catherine of Aragon.

28.name: The Ghoul
28.description: An Egyptologist returns from the dead to take revenge on those who have violated his tomb.

29.name: Cavalcade
29.description: The triumphs and tragedies of two English families, the upper-crust Marryots and the working-class Bridges, from 1899 to 1933 are portrayed.

30.name: Design for Living
30.description: A woman cannot decide between two men who love her, and the trio agree to try living together in a platonic friendly relationship.

31.name: The Son of Kong
31.description: The men who captured the giant ape King Kong return to Skull Island and find his likewise gigantic but far more friendly son.

32.name: The Vampire Bat
32.description: When corpses drained of blood begin to show up in a European village, vampirism is suspected to be responsible.

33.name: Bombshell
33.description: Sexpot film star Lola Burns seeks a new image and tries marrying a marquis and adopting a baby - all sorts of schemes which go awry.

34.name: Ladies They Talk About
34.description: Attractive Nan, member of a bank-robbery gang, goes to prison thanks to evangelist Dave Slade...who loves her.

35.name: Flying Down to Rio
35.description: An aviator and band leader who is always getting his group fired for his flirtatious behavior with the female guests soon finds himself falling for an engaged woman.

36.name: The Kennel Murder Case
36.description: Philo Vance, accompanied by his prize-losing Scottish terrier, investigates the locked-room murder of a prominent and much-hated collector whose broken Chinese vase provides an important clue.

37.name: Roman Scandals
37.description: A kind-hearted young man is thrown out of his corrupt home town of West Rome, Oklahoma. He falls asleep and dreams that he is back in the days of olden Rome, where he gets mixed up with court intrigue and a murder plot against the Emperor.

38.name: Dinner at Eight
38.description: Affluent Millicent and Oliver Jordan throw a dinner for a handful of wealthy and/or well-born acquaintances, each of whom has much to reveal.

39.name: I'm No Angel
39.description: Circus performer Tira seeks a better life pursuing the company of wealthy New York men with improbable comic complications along the way.

40.name: The Prizefighter and the Lady
40.description: An ex-sailor turned boxer finds romance and gets a shot at the heavyweight title.

41.name: Sagebrush Trail
41.description: The Duke is wrongly convicted for a killing, but he escapes from prison and heads out west to find the real killer.

42.name: Christopher Strong
42.description: A famous female flier and a member of Parliament drift into a potentially disastrous affair.

43.name: The Eagle and the Hawk
43.description: The pilots of a Royal Air Force squadron in World War I face not only physical but mental dangers in their struggle to survive while fighting the enemy.

44.name: Dancing Lady
44.description: An attractive dancer is rescued from jail by a rich man, who helps her to have her first big opportunity at a musical play on Broadway.

45.name: Elysia (Valley of the Nude)
45.description: A reporter is assigned to write a article on a nudist camp.

46.name: Female
46.description: Alison Drake, the tough-minded executive of an automobile factory, succeeds in the man's world of business until she meets an independent design engineer.

47.name: Night of Terror
47.description: The heirs to a family fortune are required to attend a seance at the spooky old family mansion. However, throughout the night members of the family are being killed off one by one.

48.name: Counsellor at Law
48.description: Successful attorney has his Jewish heritage and poverty-stricken background brought home to him when he learns his wife has been unfaithful.

49.name: Gabriel Over the White House
49.description: A political hack becomes President during the height of the Depression and undergoes a metamorphosis into an incorruptible statesman after a near-fatal accident.

50.name: The Kiss Before the Mirror
50.description: When a famous doctor kills his adulterous wife, he is defended by his best friend, an attorney--who suspects that his own wife is having an affair.
